infoBoxes.heading: Create and share your photo stories.
infoBoxes.text: Photosnap is a platform for photographers and visual storytellers. We make it easy to share photos, tell stories and connect with others.

infoBoxes.alt: desk with laptop, phone, notebook and books
infoBoxes.heading: Beautiful stories every time
infoBoxes.text: We provide design templates to ensure your stories look terrific. Easily add photos, text, embed maps and media from other networks. Then share your story with everyone.

infoBoxes.heading: Designed for everyone
infoBoxes.text: Photosnap can help you create stories that resonate with your audience.  Our tool is designed for photographers of all levels, brands, businesses you name it.
